title: [Ceraleth's Cartage]
description: Short and very rotund, a grumpy dwarf sits off in a corner, his clothing filthy with dirt and wood shavings.  A plate of sliced rolton meat has been piled atop a wedge of bread that sits in a pool of natural gravy.  A crude sign tacked up on the wall loudly declares, "You buy it, we move it" in heavy black lettering.
